caption.center: EDWIN J. PETERSON, KRIS KAIN, and TRICIA BOSAK, Petitioners, v. HARDY
MYERS, Attorney General, State of Oregon, ORDER AMENDING OPINION AND

opinion.opinion_text:
JUDGMENT The court's opinion certifying the Attorney General's certified ballot title for Initiative petition 165 (2002) and the appellate judgment in this proceeding contains a typographical error. The opinion is amended and modified as follows: The term "Supreme court" at page 2, line 12, is changed to "Supreme Court."
Dated this 8th day of May 2002.
WALLACE P. CARSON, JR.
CHIEF JUSTICE
